meanings.sent1: The palmation of the leaves helped the plant absorb more sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The palmation of the hand made it easier to pick up the small object.
meanings.sent3: The palmation of the dough made it look like a tiny hand waving.
meanings.sent4: The palmation of the clouds in the sky resembled giant hands reaching out.
meanings.sent5: The palmation of the flower petals created a beautiful, hand-like shape.

meanings.sent1: The bird's foot showed clear signs of palmation for better grip.
meanings.sent2: The palmation of the frog's feet allowed it to swim swiftly in the pond.
meanings.sent3: The palmation of the pancakes made them look like tiny hands on the plate.
